    • addIntersectionWith

      public Polyline.Intersection addIntersectionWith​(Segment segment, Distance maximumSnapDistance)
      Adds the point of intersection with the given segment (if any) to this polyline.
      Parameters:
      segment - The segment that may or may not intersect with this polyline
      maximumSnapDistance - The maximum distance over which an intersection will be snapped to a segment endpoint
      Returns:
      The intersection or null. If non-null, the returned Polyline.Intersection contains the intersection point and a modified boolean. If the modified boolean is true, a location was added to this polyline. If the modified boolean is false, an existing location on this polyline was reused and no new location was added.
